title: Two-Storied House For Sale In Welisara
details:
House available for Sale in Kandana ,Welisara, Elehi Watta Road. Walking Distance to Colombo – Negombo Main Road (100m). The size of a House is 1900 sq.ft & size of a Land 10 Perches. For the upstairs entrance separately. Highly Residential Area. It’s an area with all facilities. Most suitable for a Living.Calm & Safe environment. Free from natural disasters such as flood, landslide & etc.

Clear title & deeds.
